vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in TokenBank.WithdrawToHolder (patch_17.sol#59-64):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_addr.call.value(_wei)()) (patch_17.sol#61)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Holders (patch_17.sol#62)
